mutants.original_line: unique_elements.sort(key=lambda x: counter[x], reverse=True)  # Sort the unique elements by their count in descending order
mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def remove_duplicates(array):
    counter = Counter(array)
    unique_elements = list(counter.keys())
    unique_elements.sort(key=lambda x: counter[x], reverse=False)
    return unique_elements
